example1.cpp

00001 //
00002 // C++ Implementation: example3
00003 //
00004 // Description: Animation example from Zack Rusin's OpenVG implementation (generate 20 bmp files)
00005 //
00006 //
00007 // Author: Marian Krivos <nezmar@tutok.sk>, (C) 2007
00008 //
00009 // Copyright: See COPYING file that comes with this distribution
00010 //
00011 //
00012 
00013 #include "vgEngine.h"
00014 #include "vgBitmapFile.h"
00015 
00016 #include <stdio.h>
00017 #include <stdlib.h>
00018 #include <math.h>
00019 
00020 VGdouble gear1Rotation = 35;
00021 VGdouble gear2Rotation = 24;
00022 VGdouble gear3Rotation = 33.5;
00023 
00024 VGBitmapFile bmp;
00025 VGContext context;
00026 
00027 #define LINEWIDTH 3
00028 #define STROKE_R (26)
00029 #define STROKE_G (191)
00030 #define STROKE_B (26)
00031 #define STROKE_OPACITY (1)
00032 
00033 #define WIDTH       640
00034 #define HEIGHT      480
00035 
00036 #define NUMPTS 6
00037 VGdouble animpts[NUMPTS * 2];
00038 VGdouble deltas[NUMPTS * 2];
00039 
00040 static inline double drand()
00041 {
00042     return (double)rand()/(double)RAND_MAX;
00043 }
00044 
00045 VGPath gearsPath(double inner_radius, double outer_radius, int teeth, double tooth_depth)
00046 {
00047     int i;
00048     double r0, r1, r2;
00049     double angle, da;
00050 
00051     r0 = inner_radius;
00052     r1 = outer_radius - tooth_depth / 2.0;
00053     r2 = outer_radius + tooth_depth / 2.0;
00054 
00055     da = 2.0 * M_PI / (VGdouble) teeth / 4.0;
00056 
00057     angle = 0.0;
00058     
00059     VGPath path = vgCreatePath();
00060     
00061     vgMoveTo(path, r1 * cos(angle + 3 * da), r1 * sin(angle + 3 * da));
00062 
00063     for (i = 1; i <= teeth; i++) {
00064         angle = i * 2.0 * M_PI / (VGdouble)teeth;
00065 
00066         vgLineTo(path, r1 * cos(angle), r1 * sin(angle));
00067         vgLineTo(path, r2 * cos(angle + da), r2 * sin(angle + da));
00068         vgLineTo(path, r2 * cos(angle + 2 * da), r2 * sin(angle + 2 * da));
00069 
00070         if (i < teeth)
00071             vgLineTo(path, r1 * cos(angle + 3 * da), r1 * sin(angle + 3 * da));
00072     }
00073 
00074     vgClosePath(path);
00075 
00076     vgMoveTo(path, r0 * cos(angle + 3 * da), r0 * sin(angle + 3 * da));
00077 
00078     for (i = 1; i <= teeth; i++) {
00079         angle = i * 2.0 * M_PI / (VGdouble) teeth;
00080 
00081         vgLineTo(path, r0 * cos(angle), r0 * sin(angle));
00082     }
00083 
00084     vgClosePath(path);
00085     return path;
00086 }
00087 
00088 void setup(int w, int h)
00089 {
00090     int i;
00091 
00092     for (i = 0; i < (NUMPTS * 2); i += 2) {
00093         animpts[i + 0] = (VGdouble) (drand() * w);
00094         animpts[i + 1] = (VGdouble) (drand() * h);
00095         deltas[i + 0] = (VGdouble) (drand() * 6.0 + 4.0);
00096         deltas[i + 1] = (VGdouble) (drand() * 6.0 + 4.0);
00097         if (animpts[i + 0] > w / 2.0) {
00098             deltas[i + 0] = -deltas[i + 0];
00099         }
00100         if (animpts[i + 1] > h / 2.0) {
00101             deltas[i + 1] = -deltas[i + 1];
00102         }
00103     }
00104 }
00105 
00106 void animate(VGdouble *pts, VGdouble *deltas,
00107              int index, int limit)
00108 {
00109     VGdouble newpt = pts[index] + deltas[index];
00110 
00111     if (newpt <= 0) {
00112         newpt = -newpt;
00113         deltas[index] = (VGdouble) (drand() * 4.0 + 2.0);
00114     } else if (newpt >= (VGdouble) limit) {
00115         newpt = 2.0 * limit - newpt;
00116         deltas[index] = - (VGdouble) (drand() * 4.0 + 2.0);
00117     }
00118     pts[index] = newpt;
00119 }
00120 
00121 void animateStep(int w, int h)
00122 {
00123     int i;
00124 
00125     for (i = 0; i < (NUMPTS * 2); i += 2) {
00126         animate(animpts, deltas, i + 0, w);
00127         animate(animpts, deltas, i + 1, h);
00128     }
00129 }
00130 
00131 void pathRender()
00132 {
00133     VGdouble *ctrlpts = animpts;
00134     int len = (NUMPTS * 2);
00135     VGdouble prevx = ctrlpts[len - 2];
00136     VGdouble prevy = ctrlpts[len - 1];
00137     VGdouble curx = ctrlpts[0];
00138     VGdouble cury = ctrlpts[1];
00139     VGdouble midx = (curx + prevx) / 2.0;
00140     VGdouble midy = (cury + prevy) / 2.0;
00141 
00142     animateStep(WIDTH,HEIGHT);
00143 
00144     VGPath path2 = vgCreatePath();
00145     vgMoveTo(path2, midx, midy);
00146 
00147     for (int i = 2; i <= (NUMPTS * 2); i += 2) {
00148         VGdouble x2, x1 = (midx + curx) / 2.0;
00149         VGdouble y2, y1 = (midy + cury) / 2.0;
00150 
00151         prevx = curx;
00152         prevy = cury;
00153         if (i < (NUMPTS * 2)) {
00154             curx = ctrlpts[i + 0];
00155             cury = ctrlpts[i + 1];
00156         } else {
00157             curx = ctrlpts[0];
00158             cury = ctrlpts[1];
00159         }
00160         midx = (curx + prevx) / 2.0;
00161         midy = (cury + prevy) / 2.0;
00162         x2 = (prevx + midx) / 2.0;
00163         y2 = (prevy + midy) / 2.0;
00164         vgCubicTo(path2, x1, y1, x2, y2, midx, midy);
00165     }
00166     vgClosePath(path2);
00167 
00168     vgLineColor(context, STROKE_R, STROKE_G, STROKE_B, STROKE_OPACITY);
00169     vgFillColor(context, 0,0,0,255);
00170 
00171     vgLineWidth(context, LINEWIDTH);
00172 
00173     vgDrawPath(context, path2, VG_STROKE_PATH | VG_FILL_PATH);
00174 
00175     vgDestroyPath(path2);
00176 }
00177 
00178 void repaint()
00179 {
00180     vgClearColor(context, 255,255,255,255 );
00181     vgClear(context);
00182 
00183     VGPath gear1 = gearsPath(30.0, 120.0, 20, 20.0);
00184     VGPath gear2 = gearsPath(15.0, 75.0, 12, 20.0);
00185     VGPath gear3 = gearsPath(20.0, 90.0, 14, 20.0);
00186     
00187     vgFillColor(context, 0, 0, 0, 77);
00188 
00189     vgLoadIdentity(context);
00190     vgTranslate(context, 170, 330);
00191     vgRotate(context, gear1Rotation);
00192     vgDrawPath(context, gear1, VG_FILL_PATH);
00193 
00194     vgLoadIdentity(context);
00195     vgTranslate(context, 369, 330);
00196     vgRotate(context, gear2Rotation);
00197     vgDrawPath(context, gear2, VG_FILL_PATH);
00198 
00199     vgLoadIdentity(context);
00200     vgTranslate(context, 170, 116);
00201     vgRotate(context, gear3Rotation);
00202     vgDrawPath(context, gear3, VG_FILL_PATH);
00203 
00204     vgLoadIdentity(context);
00205     pathRender();
00206 
00207     vgDestroyPath(gear1);
00208     vgDestroyPath(gear2);
00209     vgDestroyPath(gear3);
00210 
00211     gear1Rotation += 1;
00212     gear2Rotation -= (20.0 / 12.0);
00213     gear3Rotation -= (20.0 / 14.0);
00214 }
00215 
00216 int main(int argc, char **argv)
00217 {
00218     bmp = vgCreateBitmapFile(WIDTH,HEIGHT);
00219     context = vgCreateContext( WIDTH, HEIGHT, vgGetBitmapFileFormat(bmp), vgGetBitmapFileRawData(bmp) );
00220     
00221     setup(WIDTH,HEIGHT);
00222 
00223     for(int i = 0; i< 30; i++)
00224     {
00225         char name[32];
00226         sprintf(name, "shot%02d.bmp", i);
00227         repaint();
00228         vgSaveBitmapFile(bmp, name);
00229     }
00230     
00231     vgDestroyContext(context);
00232     vgDestroyBitmapFile( bmp );
00233     
00234     return 0;
00235 }
